docs.lead_paragraph: Some academics say managing a company based on the immediate need to meet shareholder expectations can be perilous, but others say it can discourage complacency.
docs.snippet: Some academics say managing a company based on the immediate need to meet shareholder expectations can be perilous, but others say it can discourage complacency....
docs.abstract: Criticism of short-term, quarterly-oriented decision making in corporate America has spilled over into public discourse, but academic and expert opinions vary; many feel short-termism hurts investors in long run, but some say it can discourage complacency.

headline.main: The Risks and Rewards of Short-Termism

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States formally denied a request on Wednesday to pause the review of the proposed Keystone XL oil pipeline, a decision expected to lead to the project's rejection by the Obama administration.
